game.title: Savior Squad: Towers
game.description: A special squad formed by cats are here to save the world from aliens! Unlimited players can join in that coop tower defense game where you play on your brownser and control with your smartphone!
game.history: Everyone knows that cats rule the world. In Savior Squad: Towers, aliens are now trying to get all cows from the earth! Unacceptable! Without cows, how the world will have milk! Here is where Savior Squad comes, in this towers defense game with gameplay focused entire on fun (and not lootboxes), the game offers unique heroes that can be either a cat with weapons that will play like a Third Person Shooter (running in the field shooting and trowing bombs) or like a styilish swordmaster (slashing enemies in air and smashing then on the ground) or even a cat with powerfull magic powers.

features.feature: Play the game using only the browser in your computer and in your smartphone (no need to install anything!).
Unlimited players can join the game at anytime!
It's just as much fun on your own as it is in a team!
